types.name: light duty personal
types.description: Fireworks intended for recreational use during holiday celebrations, unlikely to cause harm

types.name: medium duty personal
types.description: Fireworks intended for recreational use during holiday celebrations, can cause harm

types.name: serious personal
types.description: Fireworks for the adult user. Highest rated personal class before needing a license

types.name: light commercial
types.description: Fireworks grade explosives for use in small demonstrations

types.name: show commercial
types.description: Large fireworks grade explosives for use in professional large outdoor shows

types.name: indoor commercial
types.description: Fireworks intended for display use indoors by persons with commercial licenses

types.name: light demoltion
types.description: Light demolition grade explosives for structure demolition

types.name: medium demoltion
types.description: Medium demolition grade explosives for rock blasting
